name: Occurro! - The Game of Stellar Combat
name_original: Occurro! - The Game of Stellar Combat
description:
FREE FOR THE FIRST TIME EVER!!! TUAW's Daily iPhone App! ✭ Featured by Apple!!! ✭ New and Noteworthy ✭ Best Dual-Stick Shooters ✭
"While there are several games that have gameplay similar to Geometry Wars, none have controls anywhere near as well done as Occurro! ...Occurro! nails it." - Touch Arcade
"A fantastic space shooter that is easy to pick up and play with virtually no learning curve, and will keep you coming back for more" - MustTap.com
______________________________________

Control your ship through 360 degrees of top-down fun using tilt or touch controls. Fire your lasers in any direction to destroy endless waves of enemies. Grab power ups to increase your score and add weapons. This space shooter is easy to learn, challenging to master, and impossibly hard to put down!

Occurro!™ The game of stellar combat ...from Acceleroto.
______________________________________

Wear earphones for great stereo gameplay!

Join us on the Occurro!™ Facebook fan page for the latest & greatest info.
